casebody.data:
EASTERN CAROLINA REGIONAL HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
LOFTON. No. 32PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 1, 2015. Thomas E. Stroud, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. E. Bradley Evans, Winterville, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. John R. Keller, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Andrew Cogdell, Morganton, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Theodore O. Fillette, III, Charlotte, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Cheryl A. Marteney, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. Michael J. Parrish, New Bern, for Eastern Carolina Regional Housing Authority. Peter Gilbert, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Charles Francis, Raleigh, for Raleigh Housing Authority. Celia Pistolis, Raleigh, for Lofton, Sherbreda. William K. Brownlee, Raleigh, for Apartment Association of North Carolina. Ruth Sheehan, for Raleigh Housing Authority. Alan D. Woodlief, Jr., Raleigh, for Raleigh Housing Authority. John R. Wester, Charlotte, for Lofton, Sherbreda. Thomas Holderness, Charlotte, for Lofton, Sherbreda. John R. Rittelmeyer, Raleigh, for Disability Rights North Carolina. Yasmin Farahi, for Disability Rights North Carolina. Erik R. Zimmerman, Pro Hac Vice, for Lofton, Sherbreda.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of August 2015 by Erik R. Zimmerman for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of September 2015."
